question: Who has become the  first Indian-ever to win World Badminton Championships gold?
explanation: In Badminton, ace Indian shuttler PV Sindhu has become the first Indian to book a gold medal at the World Championships at Basel in Switzerland. In the final, she defeated her Japanese opponent Nozomi Okuhara by 21-7, 21-7. This was Sindhu\'s third straight World Championships final. Sindhu is also the second women shuttler to have five medals and the third to have medals in all three colours.
